titleStmt.title: A newe ballade of a louer/ extolling his ladye. To the tune of Damon and Pithias.
titleStmt.author: Osborne, M., fl. 1568.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete at the signe of the Faucon, by Wylliam Gryffith,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Alas my harte doth boyle, and burne with in my breste: to showe to thee myne ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
